body.p:
Carlisle Nov. 19. 1864
Hon Ths. E. Bramblet
Gov. of Ky
Dear Sir I Enclose you herewith Mr. Delaneys Petition
I was Attorney for Delaney in the trial and I am satisfied his Case presents just Considerations for your clemency
He is very much afflicted with fits his neighbours & family said it affected his mind & small things enraged him & made him almost an irresponsible being --
His sho^u^lder blade was broken four and he had his arm tied up at the trial & it was broken by a fall when in a fit -- All the Jurors except one that I have seen signed the Petition --
